subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4.9 released!
msgSnippet: ... As far as I know, beta versions are never allowed in Maven Central, you need to use the beta repository (and tell your pom to point there). -- Cédric
messageBody:
On Thu, Aug 25, 2011 at 7:45 AM, sschroev <stephan202@...> wrote:

> W.r.t. your last question: as far as I could tell the beta versions were
> indeed not available in Maven central;


As far as I know, beta versions are never allowed in Maven Central, you need
to use the beta repository (and tell your pom to point there).

--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
